attributes.action: take away parental rights to child murderers and paedafiles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My grandson was murdered by his father and his brother's life was threatened.  The father whom is in prison has retained all his parental rights to my remaining grandson.  This should not be allowed.  My grandsons life is at risk.  All child murderers should lose heir rights.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "take away parental rights to child murderers and paedafiles."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19785


Prime Minister's Office
